all_text_timv: Hoffmann, Heinrich, 1809-1894. Struwwelpeter. English Struwwelpeter / [by Heinrich Hoffman]. Struwwelpeter, or, Merry stories and funny pictures Merry stories and funny pictures [London?] : [publisher not identified], [between 1910 and 1919?] 24 leaves : color illustrations ; 26 cm text txt rdacontent unmediated n rdamedia volume nc rdacarrier Cover title. In verse. Date from handwritten inscription: "Xmas 1912"--Front flyleaf. PSt Cover: on red cloth, orange stamped lettering and image of Struwwelpeter. Untidy Peter -- Cruel Frederick -- The dreadful story of Pauletta and the matches -- The story of the little black boys -- The story of the wild huntsman -- The story of the boy who sucked his thumbs -- The story of Tommy and his soup -- The story of Wriggling Philip -- The story of sky-gazing Jack -- The story of flying Robert. Rare Books copy: Gift of Marion Herzog-Hoinkis in memory of Gerhard Hertz Herzog and Charles W. Mann, Jr.; 2010. PSt Children's poetry, German Translations into English. Conduct of life Juvenile poetry. Struwwelpeter
